mapper.sql: select report_data, time_period, pa_called_num, pa_call_len, pa_call_num, zj_called_num, zj_call_len, zj_call_num, total_called_num, total_call_len, total_call_num from t_lc_report_platform
mapper.select: select (SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)) AS report_data, '0-9' as time_period, MAX(zz.pa_called_num) as pa_called_num, MAX(zz.pa_call_len) as pa_call_len, MAX(zz.pa_call_num) as pa_call_num, MAX(zz.zj_called_num) as zj_called_num, MAX(zz.zj_call_len) as zj_call_len, MAX(zz.zj_call_num) as zj_call_num, MAX(zz.total_called_num) as total_called_num, MAX(zz.total_call_len) as total_call_len, MAX(zz.total_call_num) as total_call_num from( SELECT CASE t1.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t1.called_num END 'pa_called_num', CASE t1.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t1.call_len END 'pa_call_len', CASE t1.platform WHEN 'PA' THEN t1.call_num END 'pa_call_num' , CASE t1.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t1.called_num END 'zj_called_num', CASE t1.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t1.call_len END 'zj_call_len', CASE t1.platform WHEN 'ZJ' THEN t1.call_num END 'zj_call_num', t1.total_called_num, t1.total_call_len, t1.total_call_num from ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS call_num, re.platform, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') and r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') ) as total_call_num, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') and r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '' and r.platform = re.platform) as call_len, (SELECT sum(r.call_len) / 1000 / 60 FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') and r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '') as total_call_len, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT r.platform = re.platform) as called_num, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_lc_call_record r WHERE r.create_time >= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 00:00:00') and r.create_time <= CONCAT((SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)),' 08:59:59') and r.call_len is not null and r.call_len != '') as total_called_num FROM t_lc_call_record re WHERE re.create_time >= insert into t_lc_report_platform
